attributes.action: Stop these pointless petitions, that waste everybodies time.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Quite I'm simply, sick of these stupid, pointless, petitions that seems to be the new trend in the UK this year.

Hopefully I'm not the only person who feels the same way about them - so let's drop everybody a hint.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
